name: WarMaChain
description:
Welcome to WarMaChain

Where you try to collect as many jellies as you can.

Jelly is made into GAMEJAM on Playfab servers!

If you can survive SuddenDeathwhich occurs hourly in real time you will be granted a shop to purchase LUXury Resources

The price is calculated as  Kills and GoldSpent (you have sent to homeland(server) on item purchases) per Jelly collected on that hour!

You pay with Troops and Gold you have in game on that run!

WASD to move around.

Mouse drag anything.

ESC PAUSES GAME!

TIPS

>> Try occupying empty spaces before attacking on the enemy

>> Try to keep a balance of your SCIENTIST count as they are giving you the items. Too fast production results in unmanageable inventory. 8~9 is a good spot.

>> A barracks placed on a tile produces 1 troop card wich contains 10 troops place it on a tile to have more troops.

>> When you are under attack each hit is -1 troop.

>> On SUDDENDEATH you will be granted access to the secret gamejam shop where the currency is  Troops+Gold you had on that run.  so try and have the most troops possible on game end.

  
PLAYFAB IMPLEMENTATION

SUDDEN DEATH ALLOWS FOR GAMEJAM PURCHASE
// sadly could not make it in time for jam. i plan on  implementing it after the jam.

there are 3 main Leaderboards on playfab
 GOLD SPENT // sent to homeland.
>> total amount of money sent to homeland by all the players. resets every hour! used in calculating GAMEJAM unit price

JELLY GATHERED 
>> total amount of jelly gathered by all the players. Resets every hour! used in calculating GAMEJAM unit price

TOTAL KILLS
>> Total amount of kills committed by all the players. resets every hour! used in calculating GAMJAM unit price.

the idea is in the end of each hour you are granted a chance to buy GAMEJAM jars with your total kills and money spent in that hour. 

GAMEJAM is a bragging right among players as well as buying LUXURYRESOURCES (aka skins, boosters, etc..) for your profile.
